name: Clan of Lions
storyline: A young Lion awakens. He is the last known member of the legendary Zima Clan. All other members were wiped out in the great catastrophic event. You must help him navigate the wild safari landscape as he looks to rebuild.
summary:
In Clan of Lions, you enter into a world of adventure and magic as you build your group and dominate your enemies. The magic elements make this game very unique and we believe, best in class. Find your friends, rebuild your lioness clan, defeat all the enemies, climb to the top of the food chain, and win the game. Help Zima regain its dominance. The game is part adventure and part animal simulation. This adventure simulator will take you on an ultimate epic journey as you build your warrior clan, use your magic, construct your home, defend against enemies that attack, and ultimately defeat all the Super Bosses.
Cross over crocodile infested rivers, flight against cheetahs, hyenas, Elephants, Leopards, and other dangerous animals in this high action adventure simulator.
